LanguageData.Plant_SaguaroCactus.label: saguaro cactus
LanguageData.Plant_SaguaroCactus.description: The saguaro cactus is native to desert and arid environments. When fully grown, it can be chopped for a small amount of wood.
LanguageData.Plant_PincushionCactus.label: pincushion cactus
LanguageData.Plant_PincushionCactus.description: A pincushion cactus is a short, round cactus with long pin-like needles. It is native to desert and arid environments.
